name: THE Campus Live SE Asia, November 2024 | Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
content: THE Campus Live SE Asia is back and it's heading to Kuala Lumpur for the first time. With more than 300 leaders from all corners of higher education, this event promises to deliver impactful discussions, innovative solutions, and extensive networking opportunities. Delve deeper into the following topics: - Institutional planning, governance and performance - The future of skills and employability - Transformative and equitable teaching and learning Hosted in partnership with Universiti Teknologi Petronas, the agenda will tackle the challenges and opportunities facing modern-day learners in Southeast Asia. Join us in November and be part of this transformative experience... URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2550212-0?pid=4868 Time: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM Venue details: Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre, Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, 50088, Malaysia Price: University | Super Early Bird : GBP 99.00
